multilevelmod 1.0.0.9000

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

multilevelmod (development version)

  • Switched to cli for errors (#70).

multilevelmod 1.0.0

CRAN release: 2022-06-17

  • Maintainer change.

  • Fix lme4::lme() for nested random effects.

  • a-difabio added a glmer engine for linear_reg().

multilevelmod 0.2.0

CRAN release: 2022-05-03

  • The vignette now uses the sleepstudy data.

  • Support for case weights has been added for linear_reg(engine = "lmer"), logistic_reg(engine = "glmer"), and poisson_reg(engine = "glmer") (#28).

multilevelmod 0.1.0

CRAN release: 2022-03-11

  • First CRAN release.
